title: Recruitment to the Jedi Academy
startingPoint1:
Welcome young Padawans!

To finalize your enrollment at the Academy, you will have to follow me during our exploration of the Jedi Temple! Be attentive...
startingPoint2:
And it's very likely that I have a few riddles along the way...

Start by making your way to your starting point!
startingPoint3: That's a good start... To know where to go next, propose to me an inspiring quote!
startingPointQuest2: Find a quote related to your starting point.
startingPoint4: Hmm... You're showing skills that could take you far on the path of the Force...
bookSearch1: Greetings! I hope Luke didn't intimidate you too much... I'm sure he'd be nicer to you if you brought back his favorite book!

bookSearchQuest1Level1: Find the book 'La science selon Star Wars (Mark brake)'.

bookSearchQuest2Level1: Enter the last word on page 192.
printArea1:
Ah, an offering for me? That's kind of you, I've been looking for this book for ages...

You've earned the privilege to visit our printing area!
printArea2:
Here all Jedi can print documents!

You can easily pay with your student card.
printAreaQuest2: What is the largest paper size available?
printArea3: Are you sure you're a newcomer?! You might progress faster than you think...

Hi!

Would you like to discover our meditation room? It's a peaceful place, you'll see!
comicSpace2:
Here you can come to read or even relax!

Hey, come back here!

The Jedi Temple is also a place for work and concentration... But if you need to work in groups, we have rooms set up for that!
workRoom2: These workrooms can be booked via the Affluences mobile app (minimum 3 people)!
